description: A modern town located near the mouth of the Don river in the Russian oblast of Rostov.

references.formattedCitation: Âli, Mustafa bin Ahmet. Künhü’l-ahbâr: (tenkitli metin). Edited by Suat Donuk and Derya Örs. 1. baskı. 5 vols. Türkiye Yazma Eserler Kurumu Başkanlığı yayınları. references.formattedCitation: Bowen, Emanuel, and Herman Moll.
